section.name: Depot Application Management - @DEPOT-BUILD-ID@
section.p: Depot is an application that provides support for (a) application deployment services, and (b) preferences management for humans. Depot requirements are focused on the management concerns related to the Metro component soluton. Initially this scope is closely related to Transit configuration via Depot Preferences but is intended to grow to include remotely accessible preference management and ultimately runtime management for Metro based applications via Depot Console and Depot Station.

p.i: WARNING: Depot is under active development.
